title: Customization UX
description: Live preview and form-based customization of landing page sections

requirements.title: Split customization layout
requirements.description: Each slide customization page shows form (one column) + live preview (other column), stacked on mobile

validation.notes: Responsive grid layout using lg:grid-cols-2 for desktop split view and stacked layout on mobile. Form and preview panes marked with data-testid and covered by unit tests.

requirements.notes: Implemented via responsive grid in SectionEditor.tsx (lg:grid-cols-2) with data-testid markers and passing unit tests.

requirements.title: Live preview updates
requirements.description: Form field changes update preview within 300ms (debounced) without page reload

validation.notes: Live preview uses 300ms debounce (useDebounce) to refresh preview without reload when form fields change; covered by unit tests.

requirements.notes: Implemented via useDebounce hook (300ms) in SectionEditor.tsx. Form changes trigger debounced state updates that automatically refresh the live preview without page reload.
